# coordinate

**Instance Property**

The annotation’s coordinate.

## Declaration

```swift
get coordinate(): Coordinate;
```

## Discussion

You can’t change the coordinate of a [doc://com.apple.mapkitjs/documentation/MapKitJS/PlaceAnnotation].
